title: riot please stop punishing me because other people decided to dodge
body: i picked the role i wanted to play in stop giving something else. get rid of autofill its toxic

replies.body: just played a game. lobby loads and the auto filled support says "anyone want to trade me, I play shitty as support and I refuse to do it." this player then picks azir, goes bot lane with our acd but then proceeds to steal all the cs he could. this player refused to see that what he was doing was toxic. He then tells us "I did what I did because you all didn't give me what I wanted, this is a consequence of your actions. and it doesn't matter you can all report me nothing will happen." and nothing will happen to this degenerate pile of shit he'll go on and get auto filled again and ruin someone elses game but nothing will ever happen and nothing will ever change.

this is the exact reason i said it was toxic because trolls exist people get mad when they dont get they lane so they proceed to do whatever the hell they want, this includes ruining games for others or dodging causing other people that was in their queue to possibly be auto filled

> i picked the role i wanted to play in stop giving something else. get rid of autofill its toxic

I agree

I am hoping for the day in the future that they remove the role assignment system and go back to what it used to be just for people like you and whoever dodges.  People whined about the old system and were grateful for the switch to dynamic queue.  Then people whined about queue times.  Now people whine about autofill.  It is impossible for riot to keep everyone happy.

i haven't been playing league long enough to whine about whatever they had back in the day, when i first came they had team builder which meant i queued up as a role and waited until there was a team with that role available and i was perfectly ok with waiting on that specific role. so no i didnt whine about anything.
